divs: Sighting DetailsMy husband and I were having a campfire in our back yard at approx. 9:45-10 PM last night and noticed an unusual bright circular object in the sky with a brillant reddish orange color illuminating moving at a slow pace. This object had no sound or blinking lights. It then stopped in the sky for about 1 min. then proceeded to move upward at a very face pace in the universe, then suddenly vanished. Then about 45 seconds later we noticed a second object of the same description that did the same, stopped, hovered and vanished in the sky. These objects were something out of the norm and we are convinced that these objects were 2 ufo,s.
Summary: 2 circular bright reddish orange flying objects hovering in sky,then ascendng
trends: There have been 56 other sightings in Buffalo
There was one other sighting in Buffalo on or around July 5th 2008
